news.title: Dozens more UK Afghan data breaches uncovered
news.summary: The MoD admits 49 data breaches at the unit handling applications from Afghans seeking safety in the UK.

news.title: Palestinians flee Gaza City as Israel says first stages of assault have begun
news.summary: An Israeli military spokesman says troops will deepen the damage to the "terror infrastructure" held by Hamas.

news.title: Badenoch encourages Tory councils to challenge asylum hotels
news.summary: The Tory leader writes to council leaders after a court blocked a hotel from housing asylum seekers.

news.title: ICC says it deplores new US sanctions on judges and prosecutors
news.summary: Secretary of State Marco Rubio denounces the court as "an instrument of lawfare" against the US and Israel.

news.title: Sony raises PlayStation 5 prices in US as tariff fears persist
news.summary: The Japanese technology giant cited economic challenges as it raised prices for the consoles by around $50.

news.title: Rugby star Ilona Maher has Hollywood in her sights after offer to join the WWE
news.summary: American social media sensation Ilona Maher says she may move into WWE or Hollywood as her next career move after the Women's Rugby World Cup.

news.title: Texas lawmakers approve new electoral map favouring Republicans
news.summary: Facing opposition from Democrats who fled the state to stall the vote, Republicans hope the new maps will lead to more seats in Congress.

news.title: China's Xi touts unity and development in surprise Tibet visit
news.summary: The visit to Lhasa suggests a desire to stamp the Chinese leader's authority over the region.

news.title: Delta and United sued for selling 'window seats' without windows
news.summary: Delta and United are being sued over allegedly charging extra for seats next to a blank walls.

news.title: World's oldest living person marks 116th birthday
news.summary: Ethel Caterham became the oldest living person in June, following the death of a Brazilian nun.
